request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X GET "https://sandbox-api.okto.tech/api/oc/v1/portfolio/nft" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <Okto-Auth-Token>"

  -H "Authorization: Bearer <Okto-Auth-Token>"
